name: Responsable Pédagogique Game Art H/F (CDI)
description:
Nous recherchons pour notre client, une école internationale de cinéma d’animation 3D et de Jeu Vidéo, un·e Responsable Pédagogique Game Art H/F. La structure est très proche de l’industrie, puisque toute l’équipe pédagogique vient de la production. De réputation internationale, l’école a remporté de nombreux prix et offre un environnement de travail très stimulant.

Poste

Au sein de l’équipe pédagogique, vous accompagnez les étudiants des différents niveaux sur leur parcours en définissant, organisant et mettant en œuvre les apprentissages et le suivi des projets dans l’optique de leur certification et de leur insertion professionnelle sur un métier.

Avec un réel regard métier et terrain, vous définirez les objectifs pédagogiques, les méthodes d’enseignement et les évaluations du cursus. Vous dispenserez les enseignements en cours auprès de 8 classes, vous encadrerez et suivrez les étudiants dans la réalisation de leurs différents projets et réalisations en leur partageant votre savoir-faire et votre expérience sur des domaines d’applications variés. Vous coordonnerez et mettrez en place les pipelines de production communs avec les autres formations et en collaboration avec les autres responsables pédagogiques.

Également, vous participerez aux actions de communication de l’école et à la sélection des candidats. Dans un objectif de l’école de rester très active sur la scène de l’innovation et permettre à ses équipes de lier partage de connaissances et projets techniques, vous interviendrez sur la veille scientifique et technique (réalité virtuelle, réalité augmentée, motion capture…).

Ce poste est à pourvoir à Paris au plus vite et en CDI.

Profil

Après un parcours académique vous ayant permis de développer de bonnes connaissances sur les fondamentaux du graphisme appliqué aux jeux vidéo, vous justifiez d’une expérience en tant que directeur·rice artistique ou avez encadré des projets variés en studios de production, impliquant tous les corps de métiers. Ayant une bonne connaissance du pipeline et des contraintes de production d'un jeu vidéo, vous avez de bonnes compétences techniques en termes de Moteurs de jeu.

Vous avez de réelles capacités de leadership, de communications et pédagogiques. Vous savez collaborer avec des interlocuteurs très variés et avez un positionnement de meneur·se dans l’innovation et trouver des solutions aux problématiques rencontrées.

L’idée d’évoluer dans un environnement propre au partage et à la transmission, en restant à la pointe des innovations du secteur du jeu vidéo vous motive, envoyez au plus vite votre candidature à Adoc Talent Management.

name: Directeur·rice des opérations de recherche H/F
description:
Entreprise

Adoc Talent Management recherche un·e Directeur·rice des opérations de recherche H/F. Notre client est une start-up qui conçoit et développe une nouvelle génération d'anticorps d'immunothérapie positionnés au carrefour de plusieurs domaines immunologiques à fort potentiel. Avec plusieurs levées de fond de premier ordre, la société dispose de plusieurs programmes, en phase discovery, préclinique et clinique dans l’univers de l’immuno-oncologie et de l’auto-immunité.

Poste

Au sein du département R&D, organisé de manière matricielle, vous dirigerez le Centre d’Expertise qui réalise les différentes études en transverse afin de faire avancer les programmes du pipe. Ainsi, vous managerez une équipe d’une quinzaine d’ingénieurs et techniciens experts dans leurs domaines (immunologie, cytométrie, histologie, sciences des protéines, discovery CMC), serez amené·e à la structurer et la faire grandir sur la durée. Vous veillerez au développement de vos collaborateurs, notamment en termes de compétences que vous aurez identifié comme clés.

En étroite collaboration avec les chefs de projet et les managers des équipes de recherche (preclinical discovery, preclinical development), vous identifierez leurs besoins techniques. Pour y répondre, vous organiserez, prioriserez et répartirez les études aux ingénieurs en fonction de leur expertise et leur charge. Vous assurerez le suivi des différents projets, apporterez votre soutien scientifique et technique et challengerez le design expérimental et les résultats.

Véritable manager·euse, vous piloterez l’activité du Centre d’Expertise dans ses différents aspects : équipe, qualité des prestations, respect des délais, locaux et infrastructures, budget, etc.

Le poste est à pourvoir au plus vite, en CDI, à Marseille (13).

Profil

Vous êtes Docteur·e, ingénieur·e ou titulaire d’un Master spécialisé en biotechnologies ou en biologie. Vous avez de solides connaissances en immunologie et en biologie cellulaire et avez une vraie capacité à résoudre des problèmes.

Vous justifiez d’une expérience d’au moins cinq ans sur un poste de gestion de projet ou d’équipe acquise dans le secteur des biotechnologies, en CRO ou dans le secteur pharmaceutique. Ainsi, vous savez structurer les opérations et êtes à l’aise pour fixer les priorités sur des projets multiples et simultanés.

Vous connaissez parfaitement l’organisation et le fonctionnement d’un laboratoire de R&D sous système de management de la qualité, ainsi que les enjeux spécifiques liés aux fonctionnements matriciels et aux plateformes de services.

Tourné·e vers l’humain, vous faites preuve de leadership et savez fédérez une équipe en insufflant un esprit collaboratif et d’entraide. Bon·ne communiquant·e, vous savez trouver les arguments pour convaincre. Vous appréciez les environnements exigeants et dynamiques, n’avez pas peur des défis et des deadlines à respecter. Afin d’évoluer de manière fluide dans un environnement multiculturel, un anglais et un français courants sont requis.

SI la perspective d’évoluer dans une start-up de biotechnologies en pleine croissance et reconnue comme l’une des plus prometteuse à l’échelle nationale vous attire, n’attendez plus et envoyez votre candidature (CV, liste de publications et brevets, motivations, attentes salariales) à Adoc Talent Management.

name: Immuno-Oncology Scientist - In Vitro Pharmacology H/F
description:
Entreprise

Adoc Talent Management recherche un·e Immuno-oncology Scientist - In Vitro Pharmacology H/F. Notre client est une start-up qui conçoit et développe une nouvelle génération d'anticorps d'immunothérapie positionnés au carrefour de plusieurs domaines immunologiques à fort potentiel. Avec plusieurs levées de fond de premier ordre, la société dispose de plusieurs programmes, en phase discovery, préclinique et clinique dans l’univers de l’immuno-oncologie et de l’auto-immunité.

Poste

Ayant développé une expertise forte et appréciant encore les aspects expérimentaux de votre métier, vous cherchez une opportunité qui vous permettra d’étoffer vos responsabilités et d’être rapidement reconnu·e comme référent·e dans votre domaine en transverse.

Au sein de l’équipe Preclinical Development, et sous la responsabilité du Preclinical Development Director, vous interviendrez en support aux activités précliniques de pharmacologie in vitro et ex vivo sur les projets de développement de l’ensemble des molécules immuno-thérapeutiques.

Dans cette idée, vous mènerez des études pharmacologiques in vitro et ex vivo (cytométrie 15-18 couleurs) afin de fournir des résultats qui feront avancer le développement préclinique des différents pipes. En qu’expert·e en immunologie, et en collaboration avec le Project Champion, vous proposerez de nouvelles approches expérimentales et vous en accompagnerez le développement. Vous interviendrez dans les différentes phases des études (veille, design expérimental et son implémentation, analyse des données, rédaction de rapports).

Votre maîtrise des différents essais immunologiques vous permettra d’intervenir auprès des techniciens et ingénieurs, afin de leur assurer un support et un conseil technique dans les différentes manipulations nécessaires à l’avancée des projets dans le respect des exigences en termes de qualité et de délais.

Le poste est à pourvoir au plus vite, en CDI, à Marseille (13).

Profil

Vous êtes Docteur·e en immunologie spécialisé·e dans l’immunité contre le cancer et vous avez de ce fait une compréhension en profondeur du microenvironnement tumoral, des populations de cellules immunitaires et des thérapies anticancéreuses. Idéalement, vous avez développé une expertise dans l’étude des cellules myéloïdes. Vous justifiez d’une expérience dans le secteur des biotechnologies ou dans le secteur pharmaceutique et avez déjà évolué dans un environnement multi-projets.

Expert·e en essais immunologiques, vous maitrisez les différentes techniques associées (immunophénotypage, prolifération, profilage des cytokines, co-culture, isolement de cellules immunitaires). Vous avez développé une expertise particulière en cytométrie multiparamétrique (15 – 18 couleurs), dans l’exploitation et l’interprétation de leurs résultats et dans l’utilisation des outils qui y sont associés (Excel, FlowJo, Prism, idéalement R).

Vous appréciez le travail en équipe pluridisciplinaire et dans un contexte international et exigeant où l’entraide est essentielle à la réussite des projets. Afin d’évoluer de manière fluide dans un environnement multiculturel, un anglais et un français courants sont requis.

SI la perspective d’évoluer dans une start-up de biotechnologies en pleine croissance et reconnue comme l’une des plus prometteuse à l’échelle nationale vous attire, n’attendez plus et envoyez votre candidature (CV, liste de publications et brevets, motivations, attentes salariales) à Adoc Talent Management.

name: Computing Technology Expert (Free-lance) F/M
description:
The company

Our client, is a leading telecommunications solutions provider, active in several fields where new technologies  are key. Through continuous customer-centric innovation, the company has established end-to-end advantages in telecom network infrastructure, applications and software, professional services and devices. Operating in more than 100 countries and serving 45 of the world's top 50 telecom operators and one-third of the world's population.

The European R&D centre based in Belgium (Leuven/Gent) is looking for a Computing Technology Expert M/F (Free-lance). The role will work closely with global collaboration team, technology planning team and product team, define long term and short term technology strategy, seek for collaboration opportunities with top academic scientists and innovative start-ups in EU, and drive the next generation business and consumer experience in both general purpose compute domain and AI compute domain.

Your Role

  • Responsible for technical insight of global state-of-the-art computing technology, and summarize the strategic value and opportunities for the business, reporting in a timely manner to the technology management team.
  • Responsible for collaborative resources for the company's strategic technology directions (compute technology), researching top academies, startups and venture capital firms (VCs), understanding their up-to-date research and technologies, and passing on timely investment or technology acquisition opportunities relevant to the business.
  • Build the long-term strategic alliances with the collaboration partners (KOLs, academic researchers, startup CTO, etc) to output the valuable business or research achievement.
  • Identify the technology headstreams or top resources through technical insight, and work closely with global teams to define the technical roadmap for the long term and short term R & D.

Profile

You have advanced degrees (PhD, Postdoc, Eng, Msc) from the best international universities in Computer Science, Electronical Engineering or related areas, especially in computer architecture ;

You have a strong technical background & profound technical understanding ability of at least one of the following IT technologies: memory, I/O interconnect, HPC server, AI server, CPU/GPU/NPU/DPU, accelerator, hardware/software co-design, etc.

You have an outstanding career with a lot of prestigious achievements & successes (solid track on scientific publications);

You are familiar with European Academia and you have experience on EU projects (e.g. H2020).

You are a quicker learner. You carry out a technological & scientific watch in an easy and efficient wayable to get familiar with a new area by reading academic papers, attending academic conference or talking with well-known professors.

You have demonstrated a strong ability to identify promising emerging technologies through your extensive ICT knowledge, you are aware of technology tendency, and sensitive to state-of-the-art ICT technologies.

Through your background & experiences, you developed a wide academic and industrial network in Europe.

You have excellent interpersonal interaction skills with reputable companies and persons. You excel at presenting ideas concisely to audiences from different backgrounds.

You are fluent in English and Chinese.

If you recognize yourself in this description, please contact us!

The company offers you a very attractive (personalised) salary package with a very stimulating challenge.

Send us your application (CV, motivations, list of your scientific achievements, salary expectations, availability) to Adoc Talent Management (www.adoc-tm.com).

name: FullStack Data Science Application Developer
description:
****ENGLISH VERSION FOLLOWS****

Nous recrutons, pour une grande firme internationale de conseil en économie, un FullStack Engineer pour leur bureau de Montréal ou Boston. Au sein de cette firme présente en Amérique du Nord, en Europe et en Asie, vous collaborerez avec l'équipe dynamique des sciences de données afin de trouver des solutions créatives contribuant aux engagements clients.

Vos défis

  • Collaborer avec les équipes de projet pour relever les défis informatiques et liés à la science des données
  • Identifier des façons dont la technologie peut améliorer l’offre de services
  • Contribuer à l’activité et à la recherche du client en tant que spécialiste et membre de l'équipe de projet
  • Maintenir les connaissances sur les outils informatiques à jour, former le personnel sur des points techniques et
    aider à développer la base de connaissances interne, en particulier dans un environnement Linux
  • Développer, déployer et entretenir la gestion de grandes infrastructures de sciences des données on-prem et sur le cloud
  • Développer des systèmes de production en ingénierie des données et en d’apprentissage automatique de bout en bout pour des projets de science des données full-stack
  • Utiliser des méthodologies de traitement du langage naturel pour travailler avec les données de dossiers médicaux électroniques, des médias sociaux et d’autres données non structurées
  • Optimiser les procédures de gestion et d'accès aux grandes bases de données (déclarations de sinistre, dossiers
    de santé électroniques, transactions financières, etc.)
  • Créer des portails d'analyse interactifs et des visualisations de données (en utilisant par exemple R/Shiny, Python/Flask, D3) 
  • Construire et alimenter des outils de système de calcul haute performance (HPC) sur la grille informatique et l’informatique en nuage  
  • Développer et réviser des logiciels codés en R, Python et autres langages orientés objet

Votre profil

  • Baccalauréat requis avec 3 ans d'expérience pertinente ou un diplôme d'études supérieures, idéalement en informatique, mathématiques, statistiques, économie ou autre diplôme scientifique pertinent
  • Expérience en développement FullStack
    • FrontEnd : Javascript et frameworks JS idéalement (Vue.js, D3.js, Angular)
    • BackEnd : Python, ASP.NET idéalement
  • Expérience de travail significative au sein d'un environnement Linux, ainsi que dans les technologies de conteneurisation (Docker).

Atouts

  • Compétences avancées et expérience de travail avec des bases de données orientée documents et base de données relationnelle (MongoDB, SQL Server, etc.)

________________________________________________________________

We are recruiting, for an international consulting firm in economics, a Senior Data Scientist for their Montreal or Boston office. You will be collaborating with a dynamic team to find creative solutions contributing to customer commitments.

Job

  • Working with project teams to address data science/computing challenges
  • Identifying opportunities for technology to enhance service offerings
  • Acting as a resource and participating in client engagements and research as part of the project team
  • Maintaining up-to-date knowledge of computing tools, providing technical training and helping to grow the inhouse knowledge base, specifically in a Linux environment
  • Developing, deploying and maintaining large data science on-prem and on-cloud infrastructures (e.g.: docker, K8s, databases, webapps, cloud services, etc.)
  • Developing end-to-end data engineering and machine learning production systems for full stack data science projects
  • Using natural language processing methodologies to work with Electronic Medical Record data, social media data and other unstructured data
  • Optimizing procedures for managing and accessing large databases (e.g., insurance claims, electronic health records, financial transactions)
  • Creating interactive analytics portals and data visualizations (e.g., using R/Shiny, Python/Flask, D3)
  • Building and maintaining high performance computing (HPC) tools on grid and cloud computing environments
  • Developing and reviewing software and packages in R, Python, C# and other Object Oriented Languages

Profile

  • Bachelor’s degree with 3 years of relevant work experience OR an advanced degree, ideally in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics or other relevant scientific degree with relevant experience
  • Experience in FullStack development
    • FrontEnd: Javascript and JS frameworks ideally (Vue.js, D3.js, Angular)
    • BackEnd : Python, ASP.NET ideally
  • Significant experience working within a Linux environment, as well as containerization technologies (Docker)

Assets

  • Strong credentials and experience working with document and relational databases (MongoDB, SQL Server, etc.)

name: Java FullStack Developer
description:
**** ENGLISH VERSION FOLLOWS ****

Nous recrutons pour une grande entreprise canadienne œuvrant dans le secteur des services financiers. Cette organisation, qui a mis la culture DevOps au cœur de sa stratégie, recherche un développeur Java FullStack qui fera partie de l'équipe Données & Analytique Marchés Financiers, dédiée à améliorer l’efficacité du Groupe à gérer ses éléments stratégiques.

Vos défis 

  • Participer à la création de solutions technologiques innovantes qui supportent la transformation technologique
  • Être responsable du cycle de développement complet d’applications permettant à leurs partenaires d’avoir une perspective globale sur les risques, ressources ainsi que les opportunités de transactions
  • Collaborer avec des analystes quantitatifs, des vendeurs et négociateurs pour développer, implémenter, supporter et maintenir une infrastructure technologique grandissante

Votre profil 

  • Baccalauréat en informatique, en génie logiciel ou expérience équivalente
  • 6 ans minimum d'expérience en développement logiciel avec Java (lambda, streams) et des API
  • Bonne maitrise des frameworks Spring (Boot),
  • Bonne maitrise de Python et de frameworks JS dont Angular
  • JPA/Hibernate et de programmation concurrente
  • Maitrise des cycles de déploiement CI/CD sur des infrastructures AWS dont EKS 
    • Outils DevOps (GIT, Maven/Gradle, Jenkins, Nexus, Atlassian Jira & Confluence)
    • Connaissances approfondies des technologies de gestion de données comme MySQL, Postgres, etc. 
    • Français et Anglais (niveau intermédiaire)

    Atouts

    • Connaissances de bases avec AWS (IAM, S3, EC2, RDS, EKS)
    • Intégration et de développement du middle-office (API REST, Kafka ou autre broker)
    • UI Angular
    • Linux et outils d’infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform)
    • Profiling et la performance applicative (détecter les points faibles et optimiser leur traitement)
    • Technologies Big Data (Hadoop, Spark, Hive)

    ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    We are recruiting for a large Canadian company operating in the financial services sector. This organization, which has put the DevOps culture at the heart of its strategy, is looking for a Java FullStack developer who will be part of the Financial Markets Data & Analytics team, dedicated to improving the efficiency of the Group's management of its strategic elements.

      Job

      • Participate in the creation of innovative technology solutions that support technology transformation 
      • Be responsible for the full application development lifecycle enabling their partners to have a global perspective on risks, resources and transaction opportunities
      • Collaborate with quantitative analysts, vendors and negotiators to develop, implement, support and maintain a growing technology infrastructure

      Profile

      • Degree in computer science, software engineering or equivalent experience
      • Minimum 6 years experience in software development with Java (lambda, streams)
        • Good mastery of Spring (Boot), JPA/Hibernate and concurrent programming frameworks
        • DevOps tools (GIT, Maven/Gradle, Jenkins, Nexus, Atlassian Jira & Confluence)
        • Mastery of CI/CD deployment cycles on AWS infrastructures including EKS
        • In-depth knowledge of data management technologies such as MySQL, Postgres, etc.
        • Capacity management (horizontal, vertical) in large distributed environments.
        • Fluent in French and intermediate level in English

        Assets

        • Good mastery of Python and JS frameworks including Angular
          • Basic knowledge of AWS (IAM, S3, EC2, RDS, EKS)
          • Integration and development of middle-office (REST API, Kafka or other broker)
          • Angular UI
          • Linux and infrastructure tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform)
          • Profiling and application performance (detect weak points and optimize their processing)
          • Big Data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Hive)

name: Full Stack Developer PHP7/Symfony (Permanent) F/M
description:
EN - French below

The company

Adoc Talent Management is recruiting a “Full Stack developer PHP7/Symfony” for its client, a dynamic and growing startup, a theranostic and genomic company specialising in precision oncology & sequencing of the human genome to offer, for both biopharma companies and academic research groups (geneticists and oncologists), universal and individualized computer tools to aid in diagnosis and therapeutic guidance allowing them to improve the understanding of pathologies and the management of patients.

Your Role

As part of the 15-person agile "Digital" (Scrum) team, in a challenging technical environment, you will contribute to the backend, frontend and infrastructure layers of web application development based on the latest web technologies. You will work in particular with the Product Owners, of course, but also with the laboratory, marketing and bioinformatics teams.

You will analyse business needs as part of a team, collectively define the best architecture to implement and develop web solutions that meet business needs. You will design backend applications and front-end functionalities, develop and optimise new functionalities.

You will also contribute to the development of unit tests / continuous integration (CI/CD), DevOps best practices. You will accompany the solution from development to production.

Finally, you will provide technical support for these applications, as well as their evolutionary and corrective maintenance. In the health sector, you will learn to respect strict standards of quality, reliability of results and security of information.

Finally, beyond the applications you will process, you will participate in the construction and exchange of best practices within the growing company.

Profile

You have a B.S. or Msc. in computer science, IT, software engineering or related fields and have approximately 3-5 years of experience in developing web applications, preferably in the health sector, based on scientific data.

You are competent in English and in French. You are able to perceive business needs and translate them into a customised web solution.

Your are mastering cutting-edge Web technologies (HTML, CSS, Ajax, JQuery, GIT), object oriented programming languages (PHP7, Python), PHP framework (as Symfony 3), relational DBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and you have knowledge & interest for DevOps philosophy (CI/CD implementation, web application deployment, containerized environments (Docker, Kubernetes)).

You understand the mechanisms related to the performance, availability and scale up of IT Systems.

You are a team player, seeing the objectives to be reached together while being able to work on your tasks with autonomy and efficiency, you have exceptional ability to organize, prioritise and meet deadlines. You are proactive and autonomous. You have good (oral & written) communication skills. You are open-minded and have good interpersonal skills.

The company can support you and help you to grow, particularly in terms of technical tools (MOOC) and methodologies. The company offers a permanent contract (freelance accepted) and you will be based, preferably, in France (Evry).

If you would like to join a friendly and stimulating team in a growing company to do valuable work that will help clinicians, researchers, biopharmaceutical companies and the wider community of healthcare professionals and cancer patients, please send your application (CV and covering letter) to Adoc Talent Management.

____________________

FR

L'entreprise

Adoc Talent Management recrute un "Développeur Full Stack PHP7/Symfony" pour son client, une startup dynamique et en pleine croissance, une société de théranostic et de génomique spécialisée dans l'oncologie de précision & le séquençage du génome humain pour offrir, tant aux sociétés pharmaceutiques qu'aux groupes de recherche académiques (généticiens et oncologues), des outils informatiques universels et individualisés d'aide au diagnostic et à l'orientation thérapeutique permettant d'améliorer la compréhension des pathologies et la prise en charge des patients.

Votre rôle

Au sein de l'équipe agile "Digital" (Scrum) de 15 personnes, dans un environnement technique stimulant, vous contribuerez aux couches backend, frontend et infrastructure du développement d'applications web basées sur les dernières technologies. Vous travaillerez en particulier avec les Product Owners, bien sûr, mais aussi avec les équipes du laboratoire, du marketing et de la bioinformatique.

Vous analyserez les besoins de l'entreprise au sein d'une équipe, définirez collectivement la meilleure architecture pour mettre en œuvre et développer des solutions web qui répondent aux besoins de l'entreprise. Vous concevrez des applications backend et des fonctionnalités front-end, développerez et optimiserez de nouvelles fonctionnalités.

Vous contribuerez également au développement de tests unitaires / intégration continue (CI/CD), de bonnes pratiques DevOps. Vous accompagnerez la solution du développement à la production.

Enfin, vous assurerez le support technique de ces applications, ainsi que leur maintenance évolutive et corrective. Dans le secteur de la santé, vous apprendrez à respecter des normes strictes de qualité, de fiabilité des résultats et de sécurité des informations.

Enfin, au-delà des applications que vous traiterez, vous participerez à la construction et à l'échange des meilleures pratiques au sein de l'entreprise en pleine croissance.

Profil

Vous êtes titulaire d'un B.S. ou d'un Msc. en informatique, en génie logiciel ou dans des domaines connexes et avez environ 3 à 5 ans d'expérience dans le développement d'applications web, de préférence dans le secteur de la santé, basées sur des données scientifiques.

Vous êtes compétent en anglais et en français. Vous êtes capable de percevoir les besoins des entreprises et de les traduire en une solution web personnalisée.

Vous maîtrisez les technologies Web de pointe (HTML, CSS, Ajax, JQuery, GIT), les langages de programmation orientés objet (PHP7, Python), le framework PHP (comme Symfony 3), les RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL) et vous avez des connaissances et un intérêt pour la philosophie DevOps (mise en œuvre de CI/CD, déploiement d'applications Web, environnements conteneurisés (Docker, Kubernetes)).

Vous comprenez les mécanismes liés à la performance, la disponibilité et la montée en charge des systèmes informatiques.

Vous êtes un team-player, voyant les objectifs à atteindre ensemble tout en étant capable de travailler sur vos tâches avec autonomie et efficacité, vous avez une capacité exceptionnelle à organiser, prioriser et respecter les délais. Vous êtes proactif et autonome. Vous avez de bonnes capacités de communication (orale et écrite). Vous êtes ouvert d'esprit et avez de bonnes compétences interpersonnelles.

L'entreprise peut vous accompagner et vous faire évoluer, notamment en termes d'outils techniques (MOOC) et de méthodologies. L'entreprise propose un CDI (freelance accepté) et vous serez basé, de préférence, en France (Evry).

Si vous souhaitez rejoindre une équipe sympathique et stimulante au sein d'une entreprise en pleine croissance pour effectuer un travail précieux qui aidera les cliniciens, les chercheurs, les sociétés biopharmaceutiques et la communauté plus large des professionnels de la santé et des patients atteints de cancer, veuillez envoyer votre candidature (CV et lettre de motivation) à Adoc Talent Management.

name: Scientific Content Marketing Executive (Permanent) F/M
description:
Are you a charismatic life scientist who enjoys championing science and making an impact on readers? Are you ready to collaborate with a diverse team of marketing, science, sales and product specialists, and to get hands-on with scientific writing?

The company

Adoc Talent Management is recruiting a “Scientific Content Marketing Executive” for the Marketing Team of its client, a dynamic and growing startup, a theranostic and genomic company specialising in precision oncology.

The company supports biopharma companies and academic research groups by providing a full spectrum of the latest high throughput sequencing technologies and guides healthcare professionals in their treatment decision making by providing them with its flagship solution.

Your Role

You will form a bridge between business and science within the marketing team and contribute to the creation of compelling scientific contents including white papers, emailings, website articles, application notes, presentations for internal/external use, social media posts, podcasts, scientific webinars and product brochures and videos.

Your tasks will be to develop, coordinate and implement an effective and exciting strategic content marketing plan. You will collect information, extract its essence and write effective, clear and customer-oriented content.

In collaboration with the Digital Marketing Manager, you will identify the best performing content based on Google Analytics data. You will also conduct market research and competitive intelligence. In order to stay at the cutting edge of science, you will have the opportunity to organise and attend scientific conferences.

Profile

You have a master's or PhD degree in biology, molecular biology, biotechnology or a related field, and you are strongly attracted to healthcare marketing (an experience or qualification in Marketing or communications is a plus). You are passionate about life science applications and the health sector.

You are perfectly fluent in English.

You have fantastic interpersonal, presentation and communication skills. You have a real talent for written and oral scientific communication & popularization, you are able to create impactful, effective and adapted content for clients in a variety of media (digital and paper). You are a born storyteller and a creative person.

You are passionate about gathering information, analysing the state of the art, technologies, finding key messages, make the link between scientific topics and writing content that tells compelling stories. You are proactive and enthusiastic.

You are a team player, seeing the objectives to be reached together while being able to work on your tasks with autonomy and efficiency, you have exceptional ability to organize, prioritise and meet deadlines. You are flexible, versatile and honest. You have a strong ability to manage several projects at the same time.

The company can support you and help you to grow, particularly in terms of marketing tools and methodologies. The company offers a permanent contract (freelance accepted) and you can be based in Belgium (Gosselies) or France (Evry).

If you would like to join a friendly and stimulating team in a growing company to do valuable work that will help clinicians, researchers, biopharmaceutical companies and the wider community of healthcare professionals and cancer patients, please send your application (CV and covering letter) to Adoc Talent Management.

name: Field Application Engineer (CDI) F/M
description:
The company

Adoc Talent Management is recruiting a “Field Application Engineer” for the Sales/Marketing/BD Team of its client, a dynamic and growing startup, a semiconductor company offering a portfolio of IoT connected devices including energy harvester/power management interfaces, microcontrollers and sensor solutions. They develop top-performing power harvesting technologies that derive, store and optimize energy to make device energy-autonomous and more efficient.

Your Role

The FAE is responsible for providing advanced technical support for the sale of the company's flagship products.

You act as a true ambassador for the company in this key position. You will liaise with customers and partners, as well as the sales and application engineering (FAE) team, to support the company's international development for various application areas and client segments. You will fully understand, review and recommend any design/technical improvements to existing customer designs.

In addition, You will be responsible for customer/partner requests for product customisation and will propose and contribute to the implementation of a suitable solution.

You will create or develop customer relationships and maintain high levels of engagement and satisfaction. You will write and present technical documentation, reports, recommendations at Customers, at Seminars/Trade Shows, and at on-line Webinars.

You will travel to meet customers and discuss their project, approximatively 30% of the time.

Profile

You have a degree in EE (BS/MS/PhD) specialized in analog expertise/power energy management), computer science, data science or a related field, and you are strongly attracted to commercial/sales activities (experience or qualification in marketing or sales is a plus). You have at least 2/3 years of experience as a FAE in the semiconductor industry. You are passionate about EE device innovations combining technical optimisation, solution efficiency and environmental engagement.

Beside your strong technical skills, you have a gift for understanding customer needs and translating them into the right solution. You have a real talent for establishing and maintaining excellent follow-up and relationships with your clients and partners.

You are a real problem solver, a dynamic and positive person. You are proactive, daring, persevering and result-oriented.

You are a team player, seeing the objectives to be reached together while being able to work on your tasks with autonomy and efficiency. A natural coordinator, you have an exceptional ability to organise, prioritise and meet deadlines with all your interlocutors.

You have very good written and oral technical communication skills and are a true ambassador for the company and its products.

You are perfectly fluent in English and you can manage in French (have the desire to learn).

The company can support you and help you develop, offering you many career opportunities and gradually giving you managerial or product line responsibility. The company offers a permanent contract and you can be based in Belgium (Mont-Saint-Guibert) or Switzerland (La Neuveville).

Beyond an attractive compensation and benefits package, you will get the unique chance to join the adventure, at a key position, of building up a high-potential company at the cutting-edge of technology with a young and motivated team.

If you recognize yourself in the description and are attracted by the professional environment, please send your application (CV and cover letter) to Adoc Talent Management.

name: Researcher/Cryptocurrencies Compliance Officer M/F
description:
Adoc Talent Management is looking for a researcher and compliance Officer M/F to develop a new digital asset business for its client.

Our client is a very innovative investment management start-up offering a wide range of alternative strategies, specialized in equity derivatives: dividend futures and options on stocks and indices. They have the willingness to explore new businesses and are always seeking new opportunities in ever-changing markets.

Position

As the crypto-assets compliance officer, your main objective is to explore the legal and compliance strategies and related aspects of the new digital asset business and to set-up and maintain the different policies and procedures.

Thus, you will be in charge of performing an international legal watch and analysis of the crypto ecosystem. In close collaboration with every collaborator, you will design, adapt and test compliance policies and supervisory procedures to comply with regulators' rules and any applicable state laws and regulations.

Based on your investigation of applicable regulations and your ability to think out of the box, you will identify the best innovative strategies and potential area/countries where this digital asset business can be implemented and suggest new businesses to develop. Indeed, thanks to your relationships with all the crypto space service providers (regulators, exchanges, platforms, brokers…), you will adapt the company to the necessary changes to operate in an efficient and optimal manner.

As a researcher, you will maintain an expertise at the state of the art and develop partnerships and collaborations with Universities and research Institutes and communicate on your research projects through scientific articles, attending conferences…

The position is to be filled in Paris as soon as possible, with possibilities of remote work.

Profile

You are holding a PhD diploma with a specialisation in legal and compliance facets for financial markets and you are passionate by innovation and FinTech, in particular for digital assets with an understanding of the crypto ecosystem.

More than an expert, you are a real investigator. Very creative, proactive and rigorous, you can perform legal engineering and are able to think “out of the box”. During your previous research experiences, your curiosity and willingness to explore new businesses brought you to think about new activities to develop out of standard Finance regulations. As a self-starter, you are capable of balancing risk, speed and accuracy to address complex problems.

Excellent oral and written communication skills in English are necessary for this position.

If you want to join a rising hedge fund and be the lead on a promising international venture that will be positioned as one of the pillars of its growth, send your application (CV, list of publications, motivations, salary expectations) to Adoc Talent Management!

name: R&D Scientist Process Development
description:
Our client, a fast-growing biotech SME, is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on the discovery and development of chimeric antigen receptor T cell (CAR T) therapies for cancer. They are developing a diversified pipeline of allogeneic and autologous CAR T cell therapy candidates for cancer patients with hematological malignancies and solid tumors.

JOB

You will participate in the design, supervision, planning and execution of specific scientific efforts geared towards the generation and optimization of new allogeneic CAR-T cell manufacturing processes that would consistently generate high number of cells with the best fitness to attack tumors cells and support the passage of therapies into clinical trials.

The main tasks are:

  • Conduct and deliver research studies focused upon generating innovative manufacturing processes that increase allogeneic CAR-T cell fitness and yield.
  • Manage the testing of new approaches and generate high quality analytical readouts to push further CAR-T cell characterization, and consequently further develop the company’s CAR-T cell therapies portfolio.
  • Generate scientific proposals to resolve key technical hurdles associated with his/her studies.
  • Ensure accurate internal data reporting including scientific reports drafting and reviewing and represent R&D internally (e.g. strategy meetings, research meetings, project meetings and development activities).
  • Ensure the delivery of work within R&D in line with the department objectives and the efficient cooperation and connection to other departments’ activities, such as Regulatory, Manufacturing and Clinical/Medical teams, to achieve the common goal of clinical trial delivery.
  • Initiate and generate ideas based on scientific readings and research, and therefore contribute to research plans and efforts.
  • Stay tuned on new scientific literature and maintain knowledge concerning relevant new research and new technologies.
  • Contribute to and lead upon scientific presentations (peer-reviewed publications, white papers, conference presentation) and collaboration with external stakeholders.
  • Ensure that all research studies are compliant with internal guidelines and safety protocols.
  • Develop high quality studies to support regulatory filing that underpins the clinical activity of the company.
  • Provide scientific guidance and ensure appropriate training of new scientific staff members (and students) by sharing technical expertise.

PROFILE

You have a PhD degree in biological sciences with emphasis on immunology or induced pluripotent stem cells. You demonstrate a strong expertise in metabolism, cell culture, CAR-T cells, gene transfer (e.g. retrovirus, lentivirus, transposons,…) and/or exploitation of next generation sequencing (e.g. RNA sequencing). An expertise in primary cell culture and immunological assays (e.g. cytokine release assay, flow cytometry, cytotoxicity and proliferation assays) is an advantage.

You ideally have experience in research within a Biotech/Pharma company including process development and/or cell therapy development.

You are an accomplished researcher with strong scientific and technical background evidenced by high quality peer-reviewed publication record, good scientific presentations and tangible experience in scientific project management.

You are fluent in English, orally and in writing; working knowledge of French would be an advantage.

You are willing to optimize cell metabolism & product and demonstrate a strong passion for research and sciences.

You have an enthusiastic and self-motivated personality, able to work in autonomy and pro-activity. You are a problem-solver, action oriented, delivers results and commit to achieve challenging goals. You are passionate, creative, autonomous and science driven. You demonstrate a strong ability to work in team focused on delivery of results that support the Company’s objectives.

You have excellent planning & organizational skills, showing flexibility & can-do attitude. You like to evolve in a biotech thanks a dynamic & quality mindset.

If you are willing to go for a meaningful, valuing and impacting R&D role contributing to develop & optimize product in a dynamic biotech company focusing on very pioneering science, please send your application (CV + cover letter + salary expectations) to Adoc Talent Management.

name: Research Associate
description:
Remote work from Canada

Company

Adoc Talent Management is seeking Research Associates for its client, a cutting-edge company that mixes big data with social science. The company develops and provides a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution and is a pioneer in the field of technology-enabled ethnography at big data scale. The company is currently hiring Research Associates to support their growth.  

Job

This position offers an extraordinary opportunity to work in a collaborative, multi-disciplinary environment. This role would involve various studies from plant-based proteins and sustainable packaging in food, to the future of women’s sexual health. Their clients make investments to future-proof their businesses using the results of state-of-the-art research.

Challenges is plentiful in this role and you will develop Saas platform and methodology’ expertises. You will interact regularly with an interdisciplinary project team (other researchers) to deliver completed analyses and reports using the Saas platform.

You will demonstrate the ability to collaborate and develop/maintain relationships inside and outside the firm to enable effective completion of business objectives. You will be interfacing with clients by presenting research (typically over video conference) throughout the process — from project briefing through to delivery.

Profile

  • You hold an undergraduate degree in social sciences or humanities (anthropology or sociology preferred)
  • You are fluent in English. Another language is an asset (Portuguese, French, Spanish, Mandarin).
  • You are either born in Canada or have lived in North America for at least 10 years, to better apprehend this culture (most of their clients are North-American companies).
  • You enjoy working as a team on large complex projects and have strong attention to details and quality control. You demonstrate excellent analytical and communication skills (both written and oral). You are proficient and have strong skills related to technology as apps for presentations, document creation, conference calls etc.
  • You have the ability to work fast, efficiently and under pressure. The position includes to learn quickly and work under tight deadlines and keep tasks moving. Organised and independent, you demonstrate the capabilities to prioritize multiple tasks.

Assets:

  • You have professional experience (especially in research)
  • You were research assistant in university where you gain great experience in research helping PhD students or teachers

As a Researcher, you will be comfortable in an environment that requires a high level of autonomy and intellectual curiosity. Successful candidates will be energetic leaders and have the opportunity to work for a disruptive company.

Thank you for sending your application (CV + cover letter + salary expectations) to Adoc Talent Management (www.adoc-tm.ca).

name: Front-End Developer M/F
description:
Company

Adoc Talent Management is hiring, for its client, a Front End Developer. Our client is a fast-growing Californian start-up specializing in the design and marketing of microsatellites. Their products combine the latest technologies and therefore have a unique place in this market. This international company recently established its R&D center in Toulouse.

Role
As a member of the new R&D center in Toulouse you will be in charge of developing the web application, that is allowing to control and command the satellite in orbit and that is provided to customers to control and request their payload.
This will serve as a foundation for developing a large range of applications to smooth and optimize the different phases of satellite engineering.

Responsibilities
• Develop web applications and API
• Support technologies selection
• Support technical screening of candidates to join the development team
• Support technical decisions with the San Francisco software team
• Frequent interactions with Product Owner

Requirements
• Advanced experience with Vue.js / Vuex or React / Redux
• Advanced JavaScript (>ES6), CSS and HTML skills
• Advanced experience with Vue.js / Vuex or React / Redux
• Familiarity with the SASS or LESS preprocessors
• Thorough knowledge of build systems (Webpack)
• Experience with Typescript
• Apollo GraphQL
• Jest / Cypress
• Version control (git) and continuous integration tools (GitLab CI, Jenkins, Travis CI, …)
• Fluent written and spoken English

Nice skills to have
• UI / UX Experience (Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch)
• Familiarity with authentication mechanisms (OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, etc.) and associated concepts
(JWT, …)
• Experience using WebSocket
• Comfortable with Docker containers
• Deep understanding of the MacOS / Linux concepts
• Knowledge of libraries like OpenLayers, Leaflet, Three.js, Cesium.js, Node.js, Express.js, D3.js …
• Used to working with Agile methods

name: Back-End Developer M/F
description:
Company

\n

Adoc Talent Management is hiring, for its client, a Back End Developer. Our client is a fast-growing Californian start-up specializing in the design and marketing of microsatellites. Their products combine the latest technologies and therefore have a unique place in this market. This international company recently established its R&D center in Toulouse.

concepts (JWT, …)

Nice skills to have
