Le poste peut être 100% en télétravail, depuis le Canada.

Poste

  • Être un leader technique pour l'équipe à travers la supervision technique, le coaching et le mentorat
  • Favoriser le sentiment d'ownership et l'importance de la qualité dans le code livré
  • Participer aux couches backend, infrastructure et frontend de leurs services Cloud
  • Participer au déploiement de leurs services Cloud en utilisant des technologies comme Docker, Kubernetes, Chef et les Helm charts
  • Collaboration étroite avec l'équipe: passer en revue les pull requests, suggérer des améliorations, aider les coéquipiers et discuter des solutions
  • Interface avec d'autres équipes de développement concernant l'intégration et les dépendances
  • Développement et maintien de la documentation du code source
  • Suivre la méthodologie Agile et le processus de livraison continue

Profil

  • DEC requis (Baccalauréat un atout)
  • 5 ans minimum d'expérience en développement d'applications commerciales
  • Expertise avec des technologies de développement web
  • Maîtrise de JavaScript / TypeScript
  • Connaissance d'un ou plusieurs frameworks NodeJS, comme Express, NestJS ou Fastify
  • Expérience DevOps (mise en place CI/CD, déploiement d'applications web, GitOps)
  • Expérience avec GitHub Actions, CircleCI ou Bamboo
  • Vaste expérience avec AWS (EC2, EKS, S3, RDS, VPC)
  • Expérience avec Kubernetes et les Helm charts
  • Expérience des bases de données et de l'utilisation dans les frameworks Web, tels que PostgreSQL et MongoDB
  • Expérience en création / conception d'API REST et / ou GraphQL
  • Compréhension approfondie des bonnes pratiques logicielles (injection de dépendances, design patterns, tests unitaires, etc.)
  • Compréhension des problèmes liés à la sécurité
  • Bonne connaissance de Docker et Docker Compose
  • Doit être à l'aise avec le développement de processus logiciels et les outils, tels que Jira, Bitbucket / GitHub (Git)
  • Maîtrise de l'anglais OU du français

Atouts

  • Expérience à coordonner une équipe de 4-5 développeurs (comme Tech Lead ou Scrum Master)
  • Expérience avec les produits de type SaaS (Software as a Service)
  • Expérimenté dans le développement d'applications frontales / SPA en utilisant React (de préférence), Vue.js ou Angular
  • Expérience avec Python, Bash et d'autres langages de script

---------------------------

We are recruiting, for a large firm specialized in simulation and interactive visualization, a senior FullStack web developer to join the web team dedicated to connecting a physic engine platform (real-time simulation and virtual prototyping) to the Cloud using the latest technologies and tools.
This fast-growing organization has over 100 customers including Nasa, CSA, Honda, Volvo, Hitachi and Liebherr. They are therefore looking for a new collaborator to accompany them on numerous innovative projects.

The position can be 100% remote, from Canada.

Job

  • Be a technical leader for the team through technical supervision, coaching and mentorship
  • Act as an advocate for ownership and highest code quality
  • Participate in the backend, infrastructure and frontend layers of our Cloud services
  • Participate in the deployment of our Cloud services using technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, Chef and Helm charts
  • Close collaboration with the team: reviewing pull requests, suggesting improvements, helping teammates and discussing solutions
  • Interface with other development teams regarding integration and dependencies
  • Develop and maintain code documentation
  • Follow the Agile and continuous delivery process development

Profile

  • DEC required (Bachelors an asset)
  • At least 5 years of experience in the development of commercial applications
  • Expertise with web development technologies
  • Mastery of JavaScript/TypeScript
  • Knowledge of one or several NodeJS frameworks, like Express, NestJS or Fastify
  • DevOps experience and mindset (CI/CD setup, web application deployment, GitOps)
  • Experience with GitHub Actions, CircleCI or Bamboo
  • Extensive experience with AWS (EC2, EKS, S3, RDS, VPC)
  • Experience with Kubernetes and Helm charts
  • Experienced with databases and usage in web frameworks, like PostgreSQL and MongoDB
  • Experience building/designing REST and/or GraphQL APIs
  • Deep understanding of software best practices (dependency injection, design patterns, unit testing, etc.)
  • Understanding of security concerns
  • Good knowledge of Docker and Docker Compose
  • Experienced in interacting with multidisciplinary dev teams
  • Must be comfortable with software process development and tools, like Jira, Bitbucket/GitHub (Git)
  • Must be constantly looking to learn and improve
  • Fluent in English OR French

Assets

  • Experience coordinating a team of 4-5 developers (as a Tech Lead or Scrum Master)
  • SaaS product experience
  • Experienced in developing frontend applications/SPAs using React (preferably), Vue.js or Angular
  • Experience with Python, Bash or other scripting languages

name: Preclinical Studies Manager (CDI) H/F
description:
Adoc Talent Management is looking for a Preclinical Studies Manager M/F. Our client is a fast-growing company specialized in cutting edge biomaterials technologies development and commercialization to improve the health of patients across various medical indications, in particular tissue reconstruction.

Position

As a preclinical studies manager, you are expected to plan and execute the pre-clinical strategy of our client's newly launched program.

You will be running and managing studies related to several development programs; thus, you are expected to undertake all the layers of project management starting from the coordination of the development of the study, to data collection and management, examination of the safety and performance of medical devices, evaluation of the study’s design, continuously supervise its advancement, along with ensuring the compliance of the study with the GLP, quality control, and regulatory requirements.

You will also be in charge of all operational aspects that guarantee the successful accomplishment of the study (e.g., availability of test items, timeline, budget, protocol development, data control, reporting, and study completion), while also engaging in audits, selecting, reporting, and collaborating with Preclinical Scientists, key external advisors and CROs as well as R&D researchers, therefore you need to be familiar with technical environments such as MedTech and pharma industry.

The position is to be filled in Paris as soon as possible

Profile

You hold a master’s degree or PhD in engineering or life sciences, with a good knowledge in the MedTech standards and Good Laboratory Practices. You have significant experience coordinating preclinical projects, in particular functional GLP animal studies, in the Biotech or Medtech sector and coping with the regulatory requirements.

Thanks to a professional experience of minimum 3 years, you have excellent project management and organisational skills, versatile background to run and execute studies as well as selecting and managing CRO and stakeholders’ relationships.

To collaborate efficiently with the team, you show up excellent leadership, team working and communication skills and noticeably both English and French proficiency.

You are curious and open-minded. Autonomous, far-sighted, able to anticipate, coordinate, multitask in a versatile environment, you are recognized as a problem-solver, creative in approaching technical challenges, with a desire to innovate.

Looking for a preclinical study manager and hands-on position where you will grow your skills while working on cutting-edge biomaterials technologies? Do not hesitate to send your application to Adoc Talent Management.

name: Scientific/Technical Recruiter & Training Consultant
description:
ENGLISH VERSION BELOW
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

    Adoc Talent Management est le premier cabinet spécialisé dans la gestion de carrière des titulaires de doctorat / PhDs, à travers une triple activité de conseil en recrutement, de formation et d’innovation & études. Nous étoffons notre équipe hybride, constituée de professionnels de la recherche et de professionnels RH. Ainsi, nous voulons intégrer un·e consultant·e en recrutement et formation, souhaitant promouvoir la rencontre entre les talents des PhDs et les besoins des entreprises.

    Conscient·e des changements profonds en cours dans notre société fondée sur la connaissance, vous avez envie d'en être moteur. Vous êtes persuadé·e que l'innovation passe avant tout par l'humain, notre capacité à métisser les équipes et apporter un nouveau regard sur nos métiers.

    En recherche de sens, vous êtes intéressé·e par le challenge de découvrir l'écosystème de l'innovation, tout en valorisant vos compétences en recrutement, analyse des individus et des organisations. Vous serez formé·e à nos méthodologies internes par nos collaborateurs sur le terrain.

    Vos défis

    Sous la responsabilité de la direction, vos missions principales concerneront des missions de recrutement et de formation :

    • Vous prendrez en charge en autonomie l'ensemble du processus de recrutement : la recherche de nouveaux clients et l’analyse de leurs besoins ; le sourcing, l’évaluation, la présentation et le suivi d'intégration des candidats. Vous relèverez le challenge de trouver « la perle rare » dans une logique de conseil aussi bien pour nos entreprises clientes que pour nos candidats. Vous développerez votre portefeuille de clients (grands groupes et PME) et serez l'interlocuteur·rice privilégié·e des directeurs R&D, DRH et DG. Sensible à leur satisfaction, vous deviendrez partenaire de leur succès sur la durée.
    • Vous serez en charge du développement de nos activités de formation en Amérique du Nord et aurez la possibilité d’animer des formations pour les candidats au doctorat, postdocs et personnel de recherche au sein d'universités.

    Votre profil

    Titulaire d'un doctorat, vous êtes sensible aux problématiques de recrutement et de formation. Vous maîtrisez l’Anglais et le Français pour participer aux projets de nos filiales et partenaires à l'étranger. 

    Vous avez vécu et/ou travaillé au Canada, ce qui vous permettra de mieux appréhender la culture locale et facilitera votre travail au quotidien.

    Vous êtes organisé·e, rigoureux·se et vous avez le sens du détail ? On dit de vous vous que vous être proactif·ve ? Vous avez une bonne aisance communicationnelle ? Vous êtes motivé·e par les défis et l’environnement d’une entreprise dynamique ? Venez rejoindre l’équipe d’Adoc Talent Management Canada.

    Merci d’envoyer votre candidature (CV + motivations).

    --------------------------------------------------------

    Adoc Talent Management is the first firm specialized in the career management of PhDs, through a triple activity of recruitment consulting, training and innovation & studies. We are expanding our hybrid team of research and HR professionals. Thus, we want to integrate a training and recruitment consultant who wishes to promote the meeting between PhD talent and the needs of companies.

    About you
    Aware of the profound changes taking place in our knowledge-based society, you want to be a driving force. You are convinced that innovation depends above all on people, our ability to mix teams and bring a new perspective to our business.

    In search of meaning, you are interested in the challenge of discovering the ecosystem of innovation, while enhancing your skills in recruitment and analysis of individuals and organizations. You will be trained in our internal methodologies by our employees in the field.

    Your challenges
    Under the responsibility of the Office Manager, your main missions will concern recruitment (mostly), research and training:

    • You will be responsible for the entire recruitment process: the search for new clients and the analysis of their needs; the sourcing, evaluation, presentation and integration follow-up of candidates. You will take up the challenge of finding "the rare pearl" in a consulting logic for both our client companies and our candidates. You will develop your portfolio of clients (large groups and SMEs) and will be the privileged interlocutor of R&D directors, HR directors and CEOs. Sensitive to their satisfaction, you will become a partner in their long-term success.
    • You will be in charge of the development of our training activities in North America and lead training courses for PhD candidates, Postdocs and research staff at universities and research labs.

    Your profile
    PhD holder, you are sensitive to recruitment and training issues. You are fluent in English and French in order to participate in the projects of our subsidiaries and partners abroad.

    You have lived and/or worked in Canada, which will allow you to better apprehend the local culture and facilitate your daily work.

    You are organized, rigorous and have attention to detail? You are said to be proactive? You have good communication skills? Are you motivated by the challenges and environment of a dynamic company? Come and join the Adoc Talent Management Canada team.

    Please send your application (CV + motivations).

name: Technical Sales Representative- France South Area M/F
description:
Entreprise

Adoc Talent Management is looking for a Technical Sales Representative France South Area (M/F) specialized in selling scientific capital equipment. Our client is an international fast-growing leader in life science research and the biopharmaceutical industry with a main objective of assisting and partnering with different customers to facilitate their research, development, production and manufacturing of innovative and efficient therapeutics.

Position

Within the life sales team, you will report to the Sales Manager-Southern Europe. In this Technical Sales Representative position, you will be expected to grow sales revenue at existing and potential accounts of scientific high capital equipment (particularly cell imaging product ranges) on the Southern France territory.

You will be playing a vital role in driving business deals on your market and maintaining a successful sales strategy, thus you are expected to implement a strong and reliable sales process that guarantee the successful development and execution of accounts, in addition to developing a solid post sales process while offering an excellent technical assistance thanks to your scientific and technical background and knowledge in high capital laboratory equipment as well as your hunter and sales driven mentality.

You will be constantly thriving for innovative ways to prospect and bring in new business opportunities and onboarding new leads, leading the entire process smoothly and efficiently by providing excellent communication, building long term relationships and a loyal database of clients.

Moreover, you are expected to be forecasting the markets, potential clients using your reliable pipeline, and anticipating competition while collaborating with fellow sales specialists, and colleagues in marketing and support teams. 

Throughout your role, you will be actively updating the CRM with clients and business opportunites information while achieving KPIs and annual sales targets.

The position offers various work activities and is to be filled in the South of France (Toulouse, Marseille, or Lyon) as soon as possible.

Profile

You hold a scientific or technical PhD or master’s degree in Biology, Biotechnology or life science, with a good knowledge in High capital laboratory equipment and a previous experience in sales and account management.

Thanks to a professional experience of minimum 5 years in selling scientific capital equipment, you have excellent prospecting and customer acquisition skills, ability to manage complex sales, and technical expertise to engage clients in long term relationships.

To collaborate efficiently with the clients, you show up excellent communication and interpersonal skills and noticeably French proficiency (native level), English/ German would be a plus.

You are sales-driven, highly motivated, adaptable, and confident. Autonomous, far-sighted, able to anticipate, coordinate, multitask in a versatile environment, you are recognized as a hunter, with a desire to innovate.

Looking for a Technical Sales Representative position where you will grow your skills while working in an innovative life science environment? Do not hesitate to send your application (detailed CV + motivations + salary expectations) to Adoc Talent Management.

Missions

name: Transfer Project Manager - Cell culture media production H/F
description:
Secteur d’activité : Biotechnologie | Type de contrat : CDI | Ville : Aubagne (France), Gottingen (Allemagne) ou full remote

Entreprise

Adoc Talent Management recherche pour son client un·e Transfer Project Manager - Cell culture media production H/F. Notre client est une société internationale qui propose des produits et services innovants à destinations des laboratoires pharmaceutiques et biotechnologiques. La création de ce poste à lieu dans le cadre du lancement d’une activité de production de milieux de cultures et suite à l’acquisition de start’up.  

Poste

Au sein d’une équipe en création, vous piloterez de gros projets de dimension internationale de transfert de production des milieux de culture cellulaire, dans un but d’internalisation vers de nouveaux sites de production.

Vous interviendrez de A à Z : définition des projets de transfert et road map associée, identification des personnes ressources à impliquer au sein des différents départements suivi des work packages (qualification des matières, product development, qualité, réglementaire, supply chain, data management). Vous prendrez personnellement en charge le volet Supply Chain.

En tant que Program Manager, vous animerez des réunions de suivi régulières afin de notamment repérer les problèmes et les résoudre avec les interlocuteurs appropriés. Vous assurerez la bonne documentation et le reporting sur le projet. Enfin, vous vous assurez que le projet soit réalisé dans le respect des normes réglementaires et de qualité, des délais et des coûts.

Le poste est à pouvoir au plus vite en CDI, à Aubagne dans le sud de la France ou à Gottingen en Allemagne,  ou en full remote depuis l’Europe.

Profil

Vous êtes titulaire d’un diplôme d’Ingénieur/master ou PhD en Biotechnologies, Bioproduction, Bioengineering, Bioprocédés. Ayant évolué au sein de l’industrie pharmaceutique ou biotechnologique vous appréhendez bien les procédés de fabrication, les contraintes réglementaires et les exigences qualité de ce type d’environnement. Une expérience acquise dans la production de milieux de culture cellulaire serait un plus.

Grâce à votre expérience d’au moins 7 ans, vous savez planifier & piloter des projets complexe et transversaux avec une grande autonomie. Vous maîtrisez des logiciels adaptés comme MS project.

Vous faites preuve de leadership et de force de conviction. Doté·e de très bonnes capacités de communication et relations interpersonnelles, vous aimez évoluer à l’interface entre de multiples experts métiers. Du fait de la dimension internationale des projets, vous possédez un anglais courant à l’écrit et à l’oral.  

Vous êtes capable de « naviguer » en permanence en la vision globale et l’attention aux détails. Orienté·e résultat, vous savez mesurer les risques et avez le sens des responsabilités. Proactif·ve et persévérant·e, vous savez être force de proposition et prendre des initiatives. Votre esprit entrepreneurial, votre détermination et votre agilité seront de réels atouts.

Contribuer au lancement d’un nouveau site de production et gérer d’importants projets de transfert, dans un contexte innovant et multiculturel vous motive ? Envoyez sans plus tarder votre candidature à Adoc Talent Management !


 Sector: Biotechnologies | Contract: permanent | Location: Aubagne (France), Göttingen (Germany) or full remote |

Company

Adoc Talent Management is looking for a Transfer Project Manager - Cell culture media production M/F for one of its clients. Our client is an international company who offers innovative products and services for pharmaceutical and biotech companies.  This position is created after the launch of a cell culture media production activity that follows the acquisition of several start-ups.

Position

Within a newly created team, you will manage huge international cell culture media production transfer projects, with the goal of internalising those production capacities within new production sites.

You will have a end-to-end role on those projects: you will define transfer projects and their roadmaps and identify the key people within the different departments to ensure the following of work packages (material qualification, product development, quality, regulatory, supply chain, data management). You will personally take care of the supply chain work package.

As Program Manager, you will run follow-ups meetings of the projects regularly, especially to spot the potential problems and solve them along appropriate stakeholders. You will ensure the good documentation and reporting of the project.

Finally, you will oversee the good matching of regulatory, quality, costs and time expectations to get the projects done.

The position is to be filled ASAP on a permanent contract in Aubagne (France), Göttingen (Germany) or full remote.

Profile

You have a PhD, a Master or an Engineer diploma in Biotechnology, Bioproduction, Bioengineering or Bioprocessing. With a strong experience in the pharmaceutical or biotech industry, you have a good knowledge of manufacturing processes, regulatory constraints and quality expectations in those types of environments. A previous experience in cell culture media production would be a plus.

With a minimum experience of 7 years, you know how to plan and manage complex and transversal projects autonomously. You have a good knowledge of tools such as MS project.

You have strong leadership capabilities that allow you to convince others. You also have a very good communication and superb interpersonal relations skills and you like to be at the interface of very diverse disciplines. To do so, you have a proficient English, written and spoken.

You can have the sense of details while keeping in mind the global picture. Result oriented, you know how to mitigate risks and have the sense of responsibilities. Proactive et relentless, you are a real source of propositions and you are used to taking initiatives. Your entrepreneurial spirit, your determination and your agility will be some real assets.

Contributing to the launch of a new production site and managing huge transfer projects, in an innovative and multicultural context motivates you? Send immediately your resume to Adoc Talent Management!

name: Experienced Researcher in MOF/COF Synthesis M/F (permanent contract)
description:
Is the development of key technologies on a global level your thing?

Our client is a mission-oriented Research and Technology Organisation (RTO) active in the fields of materials, environment and IT. They develop competitive and market-oriented product/service prototypes for public and private actors and work on the whole innovation chain: basic/applied research, incubation, technology transfer.

The MRT (Material Research & Technology) department, with its 200 researchers and engineers, develops activities hinge on five thematic pillars: nanomaterials, nanotechnology, scientific instrumentation and process technology, structural composites, and functional polymers. The department also includes four high-tech platforms (CoreTech), focusing on composites, prototyping, characterization and testing. These platforms serve both intern research staff, and other stakeholders in Luxembourg.

The Powder and Colloidal Engineering Group is looking for an Experienced Researcher in MOF/COF synthesis to design, investigate and characterize new colloids based on Metal organic framework / Covalent organic framework (MOF/COF) for multipurpose applications such as “hydrogen storage and release”, “CO2 trapping and conversion”, active delivery system or self-healing technology.

The successful candidate will be based in Belvaux in Luxembourg.

The role

As PI, you will develop the portfolio of highly complex national (FNR) and European RD&I projects (ranging from fundamental to industrial / application-oriented research), by acquiring funding, directing the research and supervising project researchers (PhDs, postdocs and other scientists/engineers). You enjoy contributing to current and future public or private public partnership project portfolio of MRT.

In addition, you will lead and promote the dissemination, valorisation and transfer of RD&I results (patents, licenses, prototypes, publications, technical reports, conference participation) and publish scientific results in high quality peer-reviewed journals. These efforts are to be carried out in close collaboration with other members of the group, unit and department and will contribute to the development of RTO's research and technology activities. In addition, you will actively contribute to the development of scientific and technological cooperation networks at national and international level.

Qualifications & Experience

You have a PhD in Chemistry or Physico-Chemistry, with strong expertise in colloidal sciences based on MOF and/or COF. You have a solid background in the field of stimuli responsive nanomaterial and nanoparticle synthesis.

You have at least 10 years of post-doctoral experience as an IP and research supervisor.

You must have an outstanding academic history and a very good track record in fundraising, publications, patents and project management (and supervision).

You have established, developed and coordinated collaborations with a wide range of stakeholders and have experience of coordinating and/or participating in multilateral research consortia (such as EU projects).

You have an authorisation to conduct research (HDR / ADR) or equivalent.

Skills & Competencies

In addition to your leading skills in the filed, you are also an excellent team player who is be able to share your knowledge with students, engineers and researchers.

You are an open-minded person who likes to learn from the other group members. You are a solution provider for your team and for our partner.

You are also fluent in English. You have excellent written and oral communication skills.

If you want to boost your career as an Experienced Researcher in a leading Luxembourg RTO to develop new Colloids (MOF/COF), by leading research projects at (inter)national level, please send your application (scientific CV + list of publications/patents + cover letter + salary expectations) to Adoc Talent Management.

name: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
description:
**** ENGLISH VERSION BELOW ****

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Nous recrutons, pour une firme proposant des technologies d'éclairage portables immersives, un ingénieur logiciel embarqué sénior. Vous intégrerez l’équipe R&D de la compagnie afin de travailler sur des projets innovants en créant des technologies de pointe.

Vos défis

  • Concevoir et développer les micrologiciels et les modules de logiciels embarqués qui seront intégrés dans notre portefeuille de produits. 
  • Contribuer à l'architecture au niveau du système en fonction des exigences du produit.
  • Optimiser la qualité, le coût et la performance du produit dans son cycle de développement.
  • Collaborer avec les équipes de conception industrielle et hardware pour créer des produits hautement optimisés.
  • Tester et déboguer les micrologiciels et algorithmes.

      Profil

      • Baccalauréat ou maîtrise en informatique, en génie électronique ou dans un domaine connexe.
      • Minimum 5 ans d'expérience professionnelle en développement de logiciels / micrologiciels embarqués.
      • Maîtrise du langage C et du langage assembleur
      • Capacité à lire et à comprendre des schémas électroniques
      • Capacité à lire les fiches techniques des périphériques et à écrire les pilotes appropriés.
      • Expérience en :
        • optimisation des ressources (mémoire, temps de traitement)
        • contrôle de version (Git)
        • protocoles de communication (I2C, SPI, UART)
        • protocoles de communication radio (BLE)
        • débogage, rédaction et exécution de plans de test

      Atouts

      • Expérience en temps réel/RTOS
      • Expérience dans l'architecture ARM
      • Connaissance des méthodologies Agile

      ________________________________________________________________________________________________________

      For a company specialized in immersive portable lighting solutions, we are recruiting a senior embedded software engineer. In this role, you will collaborate with the company's R&D team on new initiatives that will result in cutting-edge technology.

      Your challenges

      • Design and build firmware and embedded software modules for our product line.
      • Contribute to the system architecture in accordance with the product specifications.
      • Optimize product's quality, cost and performance during the development cycle
      • Collaborate with the industrial and hardware design teams to deliver highly efficient products
      • Test and fix bugs regarding firmware and algorithms 

      Profile

      • Computer science, electronic engineering, or related field Bachelor's or Master's degree.
      • At least 5 years experience in embedded software/firmware development 
        • Ability to read and interpret electronic schematics 
        • Proficiency in C and assembly language
        • Skilled in reading peripheral data sheets and writing appropriate drivers 
        • Experience in:
          • resource optimization (memory, processing time)
          • version control (Git)
          • communication and radio communication protocols (I2C, SPI, UART, BLE) 
          • developing, executing, and debugging test plans

        Assets

          • Knowledge of Agile techniques 
          • Experience with ARM architecture
          • Real-time/RTOS experience
